@graph.name: Optizen AI
@graph.description: Advanced Shopify SEO app with AI-powered optimization for products, collections, and tag pages. Create true sub-collections and silo structures with full control over meta information and content optimization.

audience.audienceType: Shopify store owners, E-commerce businesses, SEO professionals

featureList: AI-powered product SEO updates at scale
Collection page content optimization below product grid
Smart tag filter sidebar for collections
Variant tagger for automatic tag creation
CSV export and import for collections and tag pages
Custom AI prompt creation and repository
Silo structure creation for better SEO

offers.name: Optizen AI Free
offers.description: Free tier with 2000 AI words, basic product SEO updates

offers.name: Optizen AI Pro
offers.description: Pro features with 125,000 AI words, collection optimization, tag page control

offers.name: Optizen AI Enterprise

@graph.name: How to Use Optizen AI for Shopify SEO
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to optimize your Shopify store with Optizen AI

step.name: Install Optizen AI
step.text: Install the Optizen AI app from the Shopify App Store to your store

step.name: Configure AI Settings
step.text: Set up your AI prompts using the repository or create custom prompts for your optimization needs

step.name: Update Products at Scale
step.text: Use AI to update SEO titles, descriptions, H1 tags, and product descriptions in bulk

step.name: Optimize Collection Pages
step.text: Add content below product grids and optimize collection page meta information

step.name: Create Tag Page Silos
step.text: Edit tag pages to create optimized sub-collections and control indexing

mainEntity.name: What makes Optizen AI different from other Shopify SEO apps?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optizen AI fills a gap in Shopify SEO by creating true sub-collections and silo structures with collections, allowing you to edit meta information of sub-collection pages with AI-powered optimization at scale.

mainEntity.name: Can I control which tag pages get indexed by search engines?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, with the Optizen index feature, you can noindex all tag pages by default and only index the tags you've edited to sculpt collection silos as desired.

mainEntity.name: How does the variant image thumbnail matcher work?

acceptedAnswer.text: The variant image thumbnail matcher displays the correct image on tag pages. For example, on /collections/jackets/red, it shows all red jacket thumbnail variants, giving users and Google exactly what they want.

mainEntity.name: Is Optizen AI compatible with Shopify 2.0?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Optizen AI is fully compatible with Shopify 2.0 and includes installation support for seamless integration.

@graph.name: Optizen AI - Advanced Shopify SEO App
@graph.description: Transform your Shopify store's SEO with AI-powered optimization, sub-collections, and silo structures for better search engine rankings.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Sub Collections
hasDefinedTerm.description: Specialized collection pages created through tag optimization that provide more granular categorization than default Shopify collections

hasDefinedTerm.name: Silo Structure
hasDefinedTerm.description: SEO strategy that organizes content into themed categories to help search engines understand site structure and improve rankings

hasDefinedTerm.name: Tag Page Optimization
hasDefinedTerm.description: Process of editing and optimizing Shopify tag pages with custom meta information, content, and SEO elements

hasDefinedTerm.name: Variant Tagger
hasDefinedTerm.description: Feature that automatically creates tags based on product variants like color, size, or material
